results.name: Number of the first evil exponents (A001969) in the prime power factorization of (2n)!.
comment: Conjecture: The sequence is unbounded. (This conjecture does not follow from Chen's theorem.)
link: Peter J. C. Moses, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
Y.-G. Chen, On the parity of exponents in the standard factorization of n!, J. Number Theory, 100 (2003), 326-331.
results.author: _Vladimir Shevelev_, Apr 10 2014
